entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
